Managed IT services

24/7 maintenance and monitoring that keeps your computers, servers, and systems up and running.

Stay up and running

Backup and recovery

Prevent data loss with encrypted storage and virtualized recovery, then enjoy increased productivity.

Defend your data

Cyber security

Protect your business from malware, hackers, viruses and the most commonly security

Protect your business

IT Support

We offer a comprehensive range of managed IT support packages for all sizes of business

Find out more

IT Consultancy

Our IT consulting team will provide you with the highly available technology platform that you need

See all consultancy

Custom Software

Explore our range of bespoke software development with a strong end-user focus.

Explore our services
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1575619972311{padding-top: 80px !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/6″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”2/3″][vc_custom_heading text=”Our company” font_container=”tag:h6|font_size:10px|text_align:center|color:%23627792″ use_theme_fonts=”yes” el_class=”style1″][vc_empty_space height=”6px”][vc_custom_heading text=”A world-class IT partner of choice” font_container=”tag:h3|text_align:center” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_empty_space height=”20px”][vc_custom_heading text=”NanoSoft is a privately owned IT Support and IT Services business formed in 1988. Today we’re proud to boast a strong team of IT engineers who thrive on rolling up their sleeves and solving your IT problems and meeting your business needs.” font_container=”tag:div|font_size:18px|text_align:center|line_height:1.65em” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_empty_space height=”10px”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/6″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_class=”fix-overflow gradient2″ css=”.vc_custom_1575619981013{padding-bottom: 30px !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/12″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”5/6″ css=”.vc_custom_1537775711850{padding-top: 60px !important;padding-right: 25% !important;padding-bottom: 60px !important;padding-left: 25% !important;background-image: url(https://live.21lab.co/nanosoft/wp-content/uploads/2018/08/bg-41.png?id=1014) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: contain !important;}”][vc_column_text] [/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/12″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1575619988280{padding-top: 80px !important;padding-bottom: 80px !important;}”][vc_column][vc_row_inner content_placement=”bottom”][vc_column_inner width=”3/4″][vc_custom_heading text=”Discover our company” font_container=”tag:h6|font_size:10px|text_align:left|color:%23627792″ use_theme_fonts=”yes” el_class=”style1″][vc_empty_space height=”6px”][vc_custom_heading text=”Experience the culture that make us stand out.” font_container=”tag:h3|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_empty_space height=”20px”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][vc_column_text el_class=”text-right”]Find out more[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”20px”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space height=”30px”]
  • Mission and vision

    To be the global leader in IT services and support. Building on our technologies, competencies and customer interests, and creating value for our stakeholders and customers.
    Learn more

  • Our challenges

    From small to large, traditional to technology driven, we are proud to help customers of all sizes and verticals accomplish their goals. Discover our case studies.
    Learn more

  • Technology partners

    One of NanoSoft’s defining principles is to be vendor-neutral in everything that we do. We do, however, still rely on leading technology partners to provide products and solutions.
    Learn more

  • Meet the our team

    Highly experienced management team have brought together a group of passionate engineers to provide you with the reliable and secure technology platform.
    Learn more

  • Careers with us

    Our people are the heart of our operations, which is why we’re fanatical about finding the brightest problem solvers in the IT industry, and giving them a great place to make a difference.
    Learn more

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_section css_animation=”none” css=”.vc_custom_1575620008532{padding-top: 80px !important;padding-bottom: 10px !important;background-color: #231834 !important;}”][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/12″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”5/6″][vc_custom_heading text=”Why choose us” font_container=”tag:h6|font_size:10px|text_align:center|color:%231dc2ef” use_theme_fonts=”yes” el_class=”style1″][vc_empty_space height=”6px”][vc_custom_heading text=”Here are 4 reasons why you should choose us” font_container=”tag:h3|text_align:center|color:%23ffffff” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_empty_space height=”60px”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/12″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css_animation=”none”][vc_column]
  • People

    We understand that our people impact the success of our business, and we hire people who are smart.

  • Customer services

    We strive to provide superior customer service and ensure that every client is completely satisfied with our work.

  • Support

    Our engineers are trustworthy, dedicated and experienced and will go the extra mile to solve your IT issues.

  • Quality

    We are committed to deliver outstanding, cutting edge IT solutions that add real value that goes beyond.

[vc_empty_space height=”20px”][vc_column_text]

Stop wasting time and money on technology. Let’s get started

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”60px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1537843950112{padding-top: 5px !important;padding-bottom: 5px !important;}”][vc_column][vc_separator color=”custom” accent_color=”rgba(255,255,255,0.06)”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row gap=”35″ content_placement=”middle” css_animation=”none” css=”.vc_custom_1537775950956{padding-top: 30px !important;padding-bottom: 30px !important;}”][vc_column css_animation=”none” width=”1/6″ offset=”vc_col-xs-4″][vc_single_image image=”1408″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][/vc_column][vc_column css_animation=”none” width=”1/6″ offset=”vc_col-xs-4″][vc_single_image image=”1409″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][/vc_column][vc_column css_animation=”none” width=”1/6″ offset=”vc_col-xs-4″][vc_single_image image=”1410″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][/vc_column][vc_column css_animation=”none” width=”1/6″ offset=”vc_col-xs-4″][vc_single_image image=”1411″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][/vc_column][vc_column css_animation=”none” width=”1/6″ offset=”vc_col-xs-4″][vc_single_image image=”1412″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][/vc_column][vc_column css_animation=”none” width=”1/6″ offset=”vc_col-xs-4″][vc_single_image image=”1413″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][/vc_column][/vc_row][/vc_section][vc_section css=”.vc_custom_1575620031627{padding-top: 80px !important;padding-bottom: 80px !important;}”][vc_row][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”our approach” font_container=”tag:h6|font_size:10px|text_align:center|color:%23627792″ use_theme_fonts=”yes” el_class=”style1″][vc_empty_space height=”6px”][vc_custom_heading text=”How it helps your business succeed” font_container=”tag:h3|text_align:center” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_empty_space height=”60px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column]

  • Data transformation

    Accelerate “Data-to-Insight-to-Action” cycle, by consuming offerings like Data-as-a-Service and Reporting-as-a-Service.

  • Digital enablement

    Drive key business outcomes, using the full service digital stack – Mosaic, Digital Jedis, and human-centered design experience.

  • Innovation partnership

    Adopt a collaborative approach to innovation, by leveraging innovation labs, future financial ecosystems, alliances & partners.

[/vc_column][/vc_row][/vc_section][vc_section css_animation=”none” el_class=”mask” css=”.vc_custom_1575620052049{background: #1dc2ef url(https://live.21lab.co/nanosoft/wp-content/uploads/2018/08/slider-1.jpg?id=1059) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1575620060099{padding-top: 120px !important;padding-bottom: 120px !important;}” el_class=”mask”][vc_column width=”1/6″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”2/3″][vc_icon type=”entypo” icon_entypo=”entypo-icon entypo-icon-quote” color=”custom” background_style=”rounded” background_color=”white” align=”center” custom_color=”#1dc2ef”][vc_custom_heading text=”NanoSoft are always accommodating our diverse needs and we feel like they are a part of our company rather than an external supplier.” font_container=”tag:div|font_size:30px|text_align:center|color:%23ffffff|line_height:1.35em” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css_animation=”flipInY” el_class=”text-shadow”][vc_empty_space height=”30px”][vc_custom_heading text=”John H. careBasic

Designed for businesses with basic IT requirements
$29 /month
Pricing includes coverage for users
  • All careBasic services include:
  • 24/7 system monitoring
  • Security management
  • Patch management
  • Remote support
Start free trial
Most Popular

carePlus

Designed for businesses looking to eliminate costly break/fix IT services
$49 /month
Pricing includes coverage for users
  • All carePlus services include:
  • Preventive maintenance
  • Asset management
  • Secure cloud backup
  • Server/Network support
Start free trial

carePro

A fully comprehensive plan for any business size or needs.
$69 /month
Pricing includes coverage for users
  • All carePro services include:
  • Reporting
  • Vendor management
  • Virtual CIO (vCIO)
  • Workstation support
Start free trial
